# Preface {-}

This document is a draft thesis, intended for submission as a checkpoint of the journey that is EBS Honours 2018. The final thesis is to be completed in the coming weeks.

The research proposed is an examination of the relationships that exist between socio-demographics and voting behaviour in Australian federal elections, and how this has changed over time. Used in this study is information from each election and Census since 2001.

Data used in this study is available online from the Australian Bureau of Statistics, and the Australian Electoral Commission.
